thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 28 of 527
thread.title: Lisa Q. B.
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Lisa Q. B.

author: Lisa Q. B.
title: Lisa Q. B.
text:
I love Fabletics! It is so easy to use. I love the membership. I love the clothes, they are so adorable, fit me really well and I get many compliments! 97% of my workout wear is Fab!
Sometimes I do not like that you have to choose your credit to use vs a promo deal, but otherwise I am extremely happy. Hence the 5 stars I am giving it! :)
